item.title: HIV
item.description: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Stages Primary - 2-6 weeks post infection - non-specific illness Secondary - Asymptomatic period Secondary - Symptomatic, immune destruction symptoms begin to appear Late Stage/end stage - AIDs defining

item.title: Tuberculosis
item.description: Tuberculosis Mycobacterium tuberculosis - can affect almost any organ Infects 1/3 of the world’s population - most common infectious cause of death
